minidesc: Learn the fundamentals of Html, the language behind millions of apps and enterprise systems. Our guide simplifies complex topics like object-oriented programming and data structures
title: Learn Html
description:
Learn Html Blog

What is Html :

HTML, or HyperText Markup Language, is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser. It provides the structure and meaning of web content, defining elements such as headings, paragraphs, links, and images. It is not a programming language but rather a way to organize and label content so a browser knows how to render it.

      Some useful features

  1. Tags and Elements
  2. Semantic Markup
  3. Hyperlinks
  4. Forms
  5. Multimedia Support
  6. Accessibility
